Class TeacherDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.TeacherDAO
public class TeacherDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Teacher entities. Provides CRUD operations for the Teacher table in the database.

      public int addTeacher(Teacher teacher) throws SQLException
      Creates a new teacher in the database.
      Parameters:
      teacher - The teacher object to be added to the database
      Returns:
      The generated teacher ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getTeacherById

      public Optional<Teacher> getTeacherById(int teacherId)
      Retrieves a teacher by their ID.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the teacher if found, or empty if not found

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      classId - The ID of the class
      Returns:
      A list of teachers for the specified class

    • getTeacherByUserId

      public Optional<Teacher> getTeacherByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves a teacher by user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user associated with the teacher
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the teacher if found, or empty if not found

      Parameters:
      teacher - The teacher object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • addTeacherWithValidation

      public int addTeacherWithValidation(Teacher teacher) throws SQLException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a teacher with validation for user type and class existence.
      Parameters:
      teacher - The teacher to add
      Returns:
      The generated teacher ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs
      IllegalArgumentException - If validation fails
